text: David Jonathan Heyman (born 26 July 1961) is an English movie producer and the founder of Heyday Films. He is known for producing the Harry Potter movie series. Heyman also received three nominations for the Academy Award for Best Picture for Gravity, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, and Marriage Story. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Movie producers from London
title: David Heyman
